home_subtitle: Awarded Spa Resort and BnB in Samarqand
about_descr1: This is the best place for vacation or business trip!
about_descr2: The main healing factor of LLC 'Sanatorium Abu Ali Ibn Sino' - radon-rich water coming from a depth of 750 meters, was studied by scientists from the Research Institute. the famous sanatorium 'Tskhaltubo', temperature 37-43 C. Li, is recognized as medicinal water containing 20-25 nCi / l (nanocurium) of radon, sodium chloryl sulfate, low alkalinity (RH-8.1) and gaseous nitrogen.
about_descr3: Bright rooms and a beautiful view from the window will please the guest. Each room in our hotel is renowned for its comfort and spaciousness.
amenity_advice1: Escape To The Luxury This Summer
amenity_advice2: Tired of an exhausting trip? Don't know where to relax? Musavvir Hotel will help you relax from everyday bustle, gather your thoughts and start a new day on the right foot
